description: Allows the dragon to leave perch mode and go back to flying around.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Dragontakeoff Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows the dragon to leave perch mode and go back to flying around. Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
